name: Ext_R5_RequestOrchestration_ac_documentation
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.RequestOrchestration.action.documentation for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents RequestOrchestration.action.documentation from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/RequestOrchestration|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Supporting documentation for the intended performer of the action
element.definition: Didactic or other informational resources associated with the action that can be provided to the CDS recipient. Information resources can include inline text commentary and links to web resources.
element.comment: `RequestOrchestration.action.documentation` maps to R4B `RequestGroup.action.documentation`.  So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
